titleStmt.title: Täʾamrä Maryam “Miracles of Mary” / Täʾamrä Libanos “Miracles of Libanos”

msItem.title: I. Täʾamrä Maryam “Miracles of Mary”
msItem.rubric: Nomina sacra; names of the donors ; groups of lines on the incipit page of Text s I-1, I-2, I-4b; incipit of Text II; incipit of sections and of subsections; elements of the punctuation signs; Ethiopic numerals or their elements.

msItem.title: I-1) Mäṣḥafä śǝrʿat – Introductory rite of al-Muʿallaqah
msItem.rubric: Nomina sacra; names of the donors ; groups of lines on the incipit page of Text s I-1, I-2, I-4b; incipit of Text II; incipit of sections and of subsections; elements of the punctuation signs; Ethiopic numerals or their elements.
msItem.incipit: Fol. 4ra, l. 1: በስመ፡ አብ፡ ወወልድ፡ ወመንፈስ፡ ቅዱስ፡ ፩አምላክ፡ ዝንቱ፡ መጽሐፈ፡ ተአምር፡ ዘይትነበብ፡ እምቅድመ፡ ያንብቡ፡ ተአምሪሃ፡ ለእግዝእትነ፡ ማርያም፡ ዝንቱ፡ መጽሐፈ፡ ሥርዓት፡ ዘወጽአ፡ እምንበረ፡ ማርቆስ፡ ሐዋርያ፡ እመካነ፡ መዓልቃ፡ ዘምስር፡ ዘአንበሩ፡ መምህራን፡ መጋብያነ፡ ምሥጢር፡ ርቱዓነ፡ ሃይማኖት።[Fol. 4ra, l.1] In the name of the Father, and of the Son, and of the Holy Spirit, One God. This book of miracles that is read before the Miracles of Our Lady Mary. This book of rules that came from the seat of Mark the Apostle, from the church of Mäʿalqa (al-Muʿallaqah) of Mǝsr (i.e. Cairo), which the doctors, glorious patriarchs, treasurers of the mystery, the righteous had laid up (there).
msItem.explicit: Fol. 9ra, l. 21: ንስግድ፡ ለኪ፡ ለሰይትነበብ፡ መጽሐፈ፡ ተአምርኪ፡ በሰላም፡ ኪያነ፡ ባ [Fol. 9rb, l. 1] ርኪ፨

note.p: Fol. 7ra, l. 6-7vb, l. 15: Haleluya Haleluya nǝsǝgǝd läʾabbä bǝrhanat
Fol. 7vb, l. 16-8rb, l. 5: Sälam to the Apostles

msItem.title: II. Sälam läki ḫoḫǝtä mǝśraq "I greet you, the Threshold of the East…"
msItem.rubric: Nomina sacra; names of the donors ; groups of lines on the incipit page of Text s I-1, I-2, I-4b; incipit of Text II; incipit of sections and of subsections; elements of the punctuation signs; Ethiopic numerals or their elements.
msItem.incipit: Fol. 9ra, l.12: ሰላም፡ ለኪ፡ ኆኀተ፡ ምሥራቅ፡ ዘወልደ፡ ኖሬ፨Fol. 9ra, l.12: I greet you, the threshold of the East, who brightest forth the Light.

msItem.title: I-2) Introductory exhortation
msItem.rubric: Nomina sacra; names of the donors ; groups of lines on the incipit page of Text s I-1, I-2, I-4b; incipit of Text II; incipit of sections and of subsections; elements of the punctuation signs; Ethiopic numerals or their elements.
msItem.incipit: Fol. 11ra, l.1: መቅድመ፡ ተአምር፡ ዘሰንበተ፡ ክርስቲያን፡ ቅዱስት፡== ንነግረክሙ፡ አኃዊነ፡ ፍቁራን፡ ውሉደ፡ ቤተ፡ ክርስቲያን፨ እግዚአብሔር፡ ይባርክሙ፡ ወያብርህ፡ አዕይንተ፡ አልባቢክሙ፨ ለሰሚዓ፡ ተአምሪሃ፡ ለእግዝእትነ፡ ቅድስት፡ ድንግል፡ በክልኤ፡ ማርያም።[Fol. 11ra, l.1]: First, miracle for the Christian holy Sunday. We will tell you, our brothers, children of the church, may God bless you and enlighten the eyes of your hearts to hear the miracles of our Lady Mary, the holy and twofold Virgin.
msItem.explicit: Fol. 13rb, l. 9: ቅዱሳን፡ ወኅሩያን፡ ወንጹሓን፡ ድንግልናኪ፡ አለ፡ ይሴብሑ፨ ኀበ፡ ሥዕልኪ፡ እንዘ፡ ይጸርሑ፡ ብርሃነ፡ ጸጋኪ፡ ይትሞጥሑ፡ ኀበ፡ ቤተ፡ መርዓሁ፡ ለወልድኪ፡ ያንፈርዕፁ፡ ወይትሥሑ፨ አሜን፨

note.p: Fol. 12rb, l. 13-12va, l. 6: O ǝgzǝʾǝtya qǝddǝst dǝngǝl bäkälʾe Maryam ṣälotǝki wäbäräkätǝki.
Fol. 12va, l. 6-12vb, l. 2: O ǝgzǝʾǝtya qǝddǝst dǝngǝl bäkälʾe Maryam ʾǝmu läʾǝgziʾǝnä läʾIyasus Krǝstos.
Fol. 12vb, l. 2-13rb, l. 14: Sälam läki o ǝgzǝʾǝtya Maryam ʾǝmu läbǝrhan.

msItem.title: I-3) ʾƎsäggǝd läki wä-ʾǝweddǝsäki “I Worship Thee...”
msItem.rubric: Nomina sacra; names of the donors ; groups of lines on the incipit page of Text s I-1, I-2, I-4b; incipit of Text II; incipit of sections and of subsections; elements of the punctuation signs; Ethiopic numerals or their elements.
msItem.incipit: Fol. 13rb, l. 15: እሰግድ፡ ለኪ፡ ወእዌድሰኪ፡ ኦእግዝእትየ፡ ማርያም፡ ወላዲተ፡ አምላክ፨ ለመርዓዊ፡ ሰማያዊ፡ ጽርሑ፨ በከመ፡ ወደሰኪ፡ ዮሐንስ፡ አፈ፡ ወርቅ፡ በመኃልይሁ፡…
msItem.explicit: Fol. 14rb, l. 5: ኦእግዝእትየ፡ ማርያም፡ ሰአሊ፡ ወጸልዪ፡ ኀበ፡ ፍቁር፡ ወልድኪ፡ ከመ፡ ይስረይ፡ ለነ፡ ኃጣውኢነ፡ አሜን፨

msItem.title: I-4) Täʾamrä Maryam “Miracles of Mary”
msItem.rubric: Nomina sacra; names of the donors ; groups of lines on the incipit page of Text s I-1, I-2, I-4b; incipit of Text II; incipit of sections and of subsections; elements of the punctuation signs; Ethiopic numerals or their elements.
msItem.incipit: Fol. 14ra, l.8 (Miracle 1): ተአምረሃ፡ ለእግዚእትነ፡ማርያም፡በረከተ፡ ጸሎታ፡ወኃይለ፡ ረድኤታ፡ የሀሉ፡ ምስለ፡ ኃጥእ፡ ገብራ፡ ምኀፅንተ፡ ማርያም፡ ለዓለመ፡ ዓለም፡ አሜን፨ ስምዑ፡ አበዊነ፡ ወአኃዊነ፡ በእዝነ፡ ልብ፡ መንፈሳዊ፡ከመ፡ ንንግር{ክሙ}፡ ዘንተ፡ ተአምረ፡ ዓቢየ፡ ዘነገሩነ፡ አበዊነ፡ ቅዱሳን፡… ወይቤሉ ነበረ፡ ብእሲ፡ ለብሐዊ፡ ዘስሙ፡ ኤፍሬም፡…
msItem.explicit: Fol. 161ra, l.16 (Miracle 103): ወበጊዜ፡ በጽሐቱ፡ ኀበ፡ ሪፍ፡ ይመውት፡ እስመ፡ ከማሁ፡ ኮነ፨ ወሶበ፡ በጽሐ፡ ኀበ፡ ሪፈ፡ ሞተ፡ እኩየ፡ ሞተ፡ ወሖረ፡ ኀበ፡ ሲኦል፨ ጸሎታ፡ወስ [Fol. 161ra] እለታ፡ ወትንብልናሃ፡ ወምሕረተ፡ ፍቁር፡ ወልዳ፡ ይዕቀበነ፡ ለኵልነ፡ ሕዝበ፡ ክርስቲያን፡ ወፈድፋደሰ፡ ለደቂቀ፡ ዛቲ፡ መካን፡ ለዓለመ፡ ዓለም፡ አሜን፨

note.p: Miracle 1 is included in quire I added in the late 18th or early 19th century (the scribe used compressed script, to accommodate the text on the rest free space of the folio). The original collection starts on fol. 16r (quire II, early 16th century):

በስመ፡”…ንቅድም፡ በረድኤተ፡ እግዚአብሔር፡ ወበስነ፡ ሀብቱ፡ በጽሐፈተ፡ ተአምሪሃ፡ ለእግዚእትነ፡ ቅድስት፡ ድንግል፡ ንጽሕት፡ ማሪያም፡ ማሪሃም፡ ወላዲተ፡ አምላክ፨ …ጸሎታ፡ ወበረከታ፡ወትንብልናሃ፡ወምሕ[fol. 16rb]ረተ፡ወልዳ፡የሀሉ፡ ምስለ፡ ምስለ፡ንጉሥነ፡ልብነ፡ድንግል፡…ተብህለ፡ ከመ፡ ሀሎ፡ ውስተ፡ ቤተ፡ ክርስቲያን፡ ዘሃገረ፡ ጦላይጥልያ፨

msItem.title: III. Täʾamrä Libanos “Miracles of Libanos”
msItem.rubric: Nomina sacra; names of the donors ; groups of lines on the incipit page of Text s I-1, I-2, I-4b; incipit of Text II; incipit of sections and of subsections; elements of the punctuation signs; Ethiopic numerals or their elements.
msItem.incipit: Fol. 9va, l.1: ተአምሪሁ፡ ለብፁዕ፡ አባ፡ ሊባኖስ፡ ጸሎቱ፡ ወበራከቱ፡ የሃሉ፡ ምስለ፡ ገብሩ፡ ኪዳነ፡ ማርያም፡ ለዓለመ፡ ዓለም፡ አሜን። ወሀሎ፡ ፩ብእሲ፡ ዘየብሰት፡ እዴሁ፡ ወበጽሐ፡ ኀበ፡ መካኑ፡ ለቅዱስ፡ ሊባኖስ፡ ወተሳለመ፡ ቤተ፡ ክርስቲያኑ፨Fol. 9va, l.1: The miracles of the blessed ʾabba Libanos, may his prayer and blessing be with his servant Kidanä Maryam, for eternity. Amen. There was one man whose hand became crippled, and he came to the place of the saint Libanos, and he greeted his church.
msItem.explicit: Fol. 10rb, l.17: ወአንከሩ፡ ተአምሪሁ፡ ለብፁዕ፡ ሊባኖስ፡ ጸሎቱ፡ ወበረከቱ፡ የሀሉ፡ ምስለ፡ ኵልነ፡ ደቂቀ፡ ዛቲ፡ መቅደስ፡ ለዓለመ፡ ዓለም፡ አሜን፨Fol. 10rb, l.17: And they were amazed by the miracles of the blessed Libanos. May his prayer and blessing be with all of us, the children of this sanctuary, for eternity. Amen.

msItem.note: - Sälam läki ḫoḫǝtä mǝśraq ... "Salutation to you, Threshold of the East ..." (fol. 9ra-rb).
- ʾO-ʾǝgzǝʾtǝyä qǝddǝst wä-dǝngǝlt bä-kǝlʾe Maryam ... "O my Lady, Holy and Two-fold Virgin Mary ..." (fol. 12rb-va)
- ʾO-ʾǝgzǝʾtǝyä Maryam ʾǝmmu lä-ʾIyäsus Krǝstos kähali ... "O my Lady Mary, Mother of Jesus Christ the Almighty ..." (fol. 12va-vb l.2) (cp. ChRep no. 373)
- Sälam läki ʾo-ʾǝgzǝʾtǝyä Maryam ʾǝmmä mädḫǝn wä-ʾǝmmä bǝrhan... "Salutation to you, o my Lady Mary, Mother of the Saviour and Mother of the Light..." (fols. 12vb l.2-13rb).
The miracles of Text I-4b are numbered.

supportDesc.extent:
Made of 161.0 folios, of which 0.0 blank fols. 1r-3r, 161vb, in 22.0 quires (A+21).
28.0 20.5 5.5

list.item: 8 VI(8/ s.l. 6 stub after 3; 3, stub after 6/fols. 40r-47v)
2 XXI(2/fols. 160r-161v) Quires I and II were added later.

supportDesc.condition: The Ms. is very worn. The back board is missing and replaced by a piece of cardboard. Traces of a leather cover are preserved on the inner side of the front board. The sewing ins badly damaged, crudely repaired. Many fols. are stained with wax and dirt. Holes or tears carefully amended on fols. 1, 2, 29, 41, 49, 58, 91, 100, 107, 125, 132, 133, 134, 141, 154, 155, 156. Holes on fols. 1, 2, 21, 34, 43, 59, 87, 88, 97, 98, 116, 118, 123, 125, 126, 127, 134, 141, 144, 155, 161.

layout.ab: The upper line is written above the ruling.
The bottom line is written above the ruling.
The upper line is written above the ruling.
The bottom line is written above the ruling.
The upper line is written above the ruling (below the ruling e.g., fols. 112r-116v).
The bottom line is written above the ruling.

list.item: II. Nine dot red and black asterisk; Four dot asterisk.
III. Chain of black and red dots; ornamental band (fol. 9ra)

handDesc.handNote: Hand a and b: mediocre. Hand c and d: fine. Black; red. Maḫḍǝntä MaryamMaḫḍǝntä Maryam (hand c, late 18th or early 19th cent.) is mentioned as the scribe in the supplication formula on fol. 15vb.Hand a, b and c: 18th-19th century (?) Hand d: first half of the 16th century.
Hand c (Maḫḍǝntä Maryam): quire II (fols. 11r-15v): slender, slightly right-sloping letters.

list.item:
Fol. 3va: Donation note.Fol. 3va, ls.1-13: ዛቲ፡ መጽሐፍ፡ ዘአቤቶ፡ ጨማር፡ ዘወኃባ፡ ለደብረ፡ መስቀል፡ ከመ፡ ትኩኖ፡ መርሐ፡ ለመንግሥተ፡ ሰማያት፨ በፈቃደ፡ መምህሩ፡ አቡነ፡ ተክለ፡ ሃይማኖት፡ ትክድኖሙ፡ ለክልኤሆሙ፡ እምገጸ፡ ሞት፨ ወዕምውዑይ፡ ገሀነመ፡ እሰት፨ ለዓለመ፡ ዓለም፡ አሜን፨ ወኢትርሰዕዋ፡ ፩አቡነ፡ ዘበማያት[sic]፡ በጊዜ፡ ጸሎት፡ ወዕጣን፡ ወበጊዜ፡ ቁርባን፡
The note, written in hand a, states that the Ms. was donated by ʾabeto Ḉämmar to Däbrä Mäsqäl, in the time when the church head was ʾabunä Täklä Haymanot.

- Crude poetic notes in pen: fols. 3v, 11v (composition for Libanos?) - A few lines from the incipit of the introductory exhortation: fol. 161va. - Compressed script on fol. 15rb-15vb. - Cues for the rubricator: fol. 126v.

binding.decoNote: Two wooden boards (the back board is missing and replaced by a piece of cardboard), previously covered with leather (remains are preserved on the inner side of the front board). Two pairs of sewing stations.
Small holes or tears are visible on the spine folds of the quires, close to the head and tail of the codex.

origin.origDate: Quires III-XXI: first half of the 16th cent.(before 1540). King Lǝbnä Dǝngǝl (r. 1508-1540) is mentioned on fol. 16rb. Quires I and II: late 18th or early 19th cent. (?)

projectDesc.p: Encoded according to TEI P5 Guidelines.

person.persName: According to Additio 1, ʾabeto Ḉämmar has donated the Ms. His name (also called Zä-Wäldä Maryam Ḉämmar) and that of ʾabunä Täklä Haymanot are written in the supplication formulas on fols. 9rab (hand a). Wäldä Śǝllase is mentioned in the supplication formula on fol. 9va in hand b. The names of ʾAmdä Yoḥannǝs and Säblä Wängel are stated in the supplication formula in fol. 15vb (hand c).

revisionDesc.change: transformed from mycore to TEI P5
